definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: Fred has plenty of girl friends, although he is no oil painting.
sentences.chinese: 尽管弗雷其貌不扬，可他有许多女朋友。

sentences.english: His face was small and ugly.
Crops for fuel, in contrast, can be ugly or stunted.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下燃料作物可以其貌不扬或发育矮小。

sentences.english: "I was a late bloomer, " She has said of her time at Beverly Hills High School.
sentences.chinese: 她说在比弗利山高中时期其貌不扬，其实很靓啦。

sentences.english: Prodigal only one meter six, she was touted as nothing to boast about.
sentences.chinese: 浪子才一米六，她却吹嘘成其貌不扬。

definition: erhua variant of 不起眼[bu4 qi3 yan3]
you can't judge a person by appearance, just as you can't measure the sea with a pint pot (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 bu4 ke3 mao4 xiang4 , hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2
related.word: 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量

definition: lit. to not show the mountain and to not reveal the water (idiom); fig. to hide the key facts
pinyin: bu4 xian3 shan1 bu4 lu4 shui3

definition: you can't judge a person by appearance (idiom)/you can't judge a book by its cover/often in combination 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量[ren2 bu4 ke3 mao4 xiang4 , hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2]
